snippet: A former state investigator looking into Google's Street View has identified the so-called Engineer Doe. The former investigator said he was Marius Milner, a programmer who created a program called NetStumbler and is highly regarded in the field of...
abstract: A former state investigator looking into Google's Street View has identified the so-called Engineer Doe. The former investigator said he was Marius Milner, a programmer who created a program called NetStumbler and is highly regarded in the field of Wi-Fi networking. Read more »

headline.main: Engineer in Google Street View Case Is Identified
